mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.description, isz.size, isz.stock, isz.price FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN inventory_sizes isz ON i.item_id = isz.item_id WHERE on_sale = 1

SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.description, isz.size_id, isz.size, isz.stock, isz.price FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN inventory_sizes isz ON i.item_id = isz.item_id WHERE on_sale = 1 AND i.item_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item ( user_id, item_id, quantity, size_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{quantity}, #{sizeId})
mapper.select: Select ici.index_id, u.username, ici.user_id, ici.root, ici.parent, ici.like_count, ici.type, ici.create_time, ici.comment_id, c.content, rd.quantity, rd.item_name, rd.size_name FROM item_comment_index ici LEFT JOIN review_details rd on ici.index_id = rd.index_id LEFT JOIN comment c on ici.index_id = c.index_id LEFT JOIN user u on ici.user_id = u.user_id WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
